subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: General Manager Jeff Luhnow said the Astros sent a scout to look at Roger Clemens and the left-hander Scott Kazmir, now Clemens’s teammate on the Sugar Land Skeeters of the independent Atlantic League.
snippet: General Manager Jeff Luhnow said the Astros sent a scout to look at Roger Clemens and the left-hander Scott Kazmir, now Clemens’s teammate on the Sugar Land Skeeters of the independent Atlantic League.
